statements: SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_id = 1;
SELECT expense_id, transaction_date, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT expense_id, category FROM expenses ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_id = 1;
SELECT category, amount FROM expenses WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Travel';
SELECT expense_id, category, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_description FROM transactions WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT transaction_description, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_description, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_description FROM transactions WHERE category_id = 1 AND transaction_amount < 50;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_description, category_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT t.transaction_id, tc.category_name FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_categories tc ON t.category_id = tc.category_id;
SELECT transaction_description, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_description;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY category_id DESC, transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM categories WHERE category_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT description FROM transactions WHERE id = 3;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT t.id, t.amount, c.category_name FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_categories tc ON t.id = tc.transaction_id JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id;

SELECT t.id AS transaction_id, t.transaction_date, c.category_name FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_categories tc ON t.id = tc.transaction_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = 'Groceries';
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_id, amount, category FROM expenses WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, description, amount FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 12345 AND expense_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM classification_rules WHERE condition LIKE '%groceries%' AND category_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, description, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category_name, count(*) as total_expenses FROM categories JOIN expenses ON categories.category_id = expenses.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT e.category, sum(e.amount) as total_amount FROM expenses e JOIN classification_rules cr ON e.category = cr.category_id GROUP BY e.category;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN expenses ON transactions.expense_id = expenses.expense_id ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date, expenses.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date, transaction_description FROM Transactions;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date, transaction_description FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount >= 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND category_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id AS ID, t.transaction_amount AS Amount, c.category_name AS Category FROM Transactions t JOIN TransactionCategories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id JOIN Categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE t.transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT u.username, t.transaction_description, c.category_name FROM Users u JOIN UserTransactions ut ON u.user_id = ut.user_id JOIN Transactions t ON ut.transaction_id = t.transaction_id JOIN TransactionCategories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id JOIN Categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe' AND c.category_name = 'Food';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, c.category_name FROM Transactions t JOIN TransactionCategories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id JOIN Categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY t.transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
